title: FARI Waterproof Electronic Foot File Pedicure Electric Callus Remover Battery Operated With Turbo-Boost Motor -Easily Remove Dead Hard Cracked Rough Skin -1 Extra Coarse Roller Included (Purple)
description: The FARI callus remover is a handheld rechargeable electric callus remover that quickly and efficiently removes dead skin and rough patches around your feet. One of the key benefits of the FARI foot file is that it is cordless and lets you conveniently and comfortably buff your feet without having to sit near an outlet or having to change batteries. People are often left to their own devices to care for their feet when it fits into their busy schedules. But unfortunately home pedicures don't typically provide the same results without the professional tools found at a salon. Instead, many people have found that owning an electric callus remover is the best way for them to achieve beautiful, soft feet without the time and expense with regular spa visits. • Most powerful motor among competing products. • Advanced roller design with finely ground diamond crystals. • Battery operated electric foot file with 2xAA batteries (NOT Included),safe and convenient. • Ergonomic soft touch handle makes this product easy and comfortable to remove the dead skin from feet and cracked heels. This product package contains: 1x Electric Callus Remover 2x Roller Heads 1x Cleaning Brush
